page.title: 07CHILDREN'S GAMES EDINBURGH
page.content: {Skipping}is a girls game where 2 people hold a rope at each end and turn it round (this is called {"cawing").}Somebody stands in the middle of the rope when it is turning and jumps with the beat of the rope while everyone usually sings little rhyming song.A favourite game of the moment is{"Chainy".}It is very like "Tig".At least 3 people are needed. One child is designated to be on and after counting to 21 he/she runs after the remaining players whereupon they form a chain by holding hands.These 2 games are usually played in the playground most of the yeare round. Other games can be seasonal like {"conkers".}Conkers drop from the Horsechesnut tree in the Autumn.They are each attached to string for hitting other conkers.A strong one wins by breaking the weaker conkers.
